content.rendered:
Having been trained under the watchful eye of Reuben and Jen, Jessica’s rise to being one of the most in-demand stylists within the salon, has been a rapid one.

With her skills in Balayage, Free Hand Painting and Colour Correction on a par with what our clients have come to expect from our colour specialists. Her attention to detail is what stands out in her work and has a long waiting list of diehard clients.

She delivers beautiful clean work whether it be natural or dramatic colour with the integrity of the hair being a priority. She leaves no stone unturned in her communication for her client’s needs and wants.

“I love the consultation process involving doing my clients hair. Finding inspiration for my clients personal look, lifestyle and personality is key for me giving them a look they will fall in love with”.

At Luxe we want our clients to “look good and feel Fantastic” and we are really proud of Jessica who has continually strived to achieve a high standard of hair dressing. She has worked with some of the industry’s best hairdressers, such as Chris Burton, Toni & Guy, Dario Controneo, Edwards & Co, Hair & Harlow & styling with Natalie Anne.

Jessica is a strong individual who shows a true passion for Luxe and her clients.

Availability: Tuesday, Thursday, Friday & Saturday.

excerpt.rendered: Jessica is a strong individual who shows a true passion for Luxe and her clients.
